projects.title: Degnejorden
projects.description: New construction with 95 terraced single-family houses, 5 small communal buildings and a larger community house.

projects.title: Ski school quarter
projects.tagline: Urban development in the heart of Ski
projects.description: Regulation of the quarter in the center of Ski, designing a new residential area. Schools, kindergartens, sports halls, and cultural facilities will, together with the new residential area, surround the new city park in Ski.

projects.title: Norrtälje Mortuary
projects.tagline: Tasteful design for a dignified farewell
projects.description: In this project, we focused primarily on two aspects: the opportunity for family members to say goodbye in a non-denominational, dignified environment and a good working environment for the staff, with an effective flow from the existing hospital.

projects.title: Fællesskabets Hus
projects.tagline: A space for care and domesticity
projects.description: Fællesskabets Hus consists of dementia-friendly homes and a shared activity centre. The building is also designed to be a place that engages everyone in the local area and supports the welfare alliances between citizens, organisations and the municipality.

projects.title: Stovnertårnet - Stovner tower
projects.description: The lookout tower at Stovner is an emerging wooden walkway, where the public gets a view of the city of Oslo. The project has been named Norway's most inclusive innovation project for landscape architecture.

projects.title: Natrium
projects.description: Natrium, en 32 000 kvadratmeter stor byggnad på Medicinareberget, samlar 3 000 studenter och 600 medarbetare vid Naturvetenskapliga fakulteten på Göteborgs universitet. Här har vi arbetat med en inredningsarkitektur som är både tekniskt avancerad, flexibel och estetiskt tilltalande.

projects.title: The Parkside
projects.description: Med höga krav på arkitektonisk kvalitet har vi fått förtroendet att gestalta ett nytt Mixed Use-kvarter på Masthuggskajen. Det blir ett levande kvarter där bostäder, kommersiella lokaler och verksamheter möts på ett av Göteborgs bästa lägen.

projects.title: Fjordbyen Lier og Drammen
projects.description: The development of the Fjord City of Lier and Drammen is one of the largest ongoing urban development projects in Norway. LINK Arkitektur is in charge of the city concept and preparation of the area plan. The assignment aims to become a model project for sustainable urban development at an international level. The Fjord City will be attractive, urban, and sustainable - a place where people, the fjord, and the future meet.

projects.title: Ransbergs skola
projects.description: Vackert beläget mellan sjö och skog ligger Ransberg med knappt två tusen invånare. Här har de precis invigt sin nya skola för årskurs F-6, med inspirerande lärmiljöer mitt i naturen och lekfulla referenser till myten om Jätten Rane. LINK Arkitektur står bakom gestaltningen av den nya skolan.

projects.title: Humanisten
projects.tagline: A variety of study environments linking four decades
projects.description: In Humanisten, at Gothenburg University, we worked with a design that helps attract international humanities students and researchers.

projects.title: Danish Center for Particle Therapy
projects.description: The Danish Centre for Particle Therapy at the new Aarhus University Hospital is the most advanced radiation therapy centre in Denmark. There are only a few similar buildings in the world, making this new Danish treatment option quite unique – and pioneering in the field of cancer treatment.

projects.title: Vennesla church
projects.description: The new Vennesla church is a cornerstone for a larger church complex in Vennesla and will be a new landmark in the county of Agder.
